website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price per pound for a small-breed dog food from a trusted manufacturer.
pros: Has a satisfying crunch in the small-sized kibbles that helps to keep the dog's teeth clean
Most dogs are able to easily digest this recipe
Includes multiple sources of protein to help with lean muscle development
cons: You may find occasional quality-control issues from bag to bag

customer_reviews.title: 14 year old golden retriever still active
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever is still in great shape after 14 years because of this dog food; 1 cup twice a day. He looks and acts half his age. My next dog will eat nothing but Iams... well, maybe the occasional banana or carrot too
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Veterinarian
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs; a Jack Russel mix, a German Shepherd/Collie mix, and an Australian Shepherd. I've tried different foods with them as they were growing up, but as adults this is the one food they will all continuously eat. We average one of these big bags about every 2 weeks, the dogs are all healthy, energetic, playful, and have beautiful coats. I'm not in a position to pay $50+ per bag for Blue what ever, this stuff does the trick and even my vet said, buy what you can afford, but try to keep overall quality in mind, and said that there was absolutely nothing wrong with Iams.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Fried Redneck

customer_reviews.title: my little dog isn't scratching all the time
customer_reviews.text: My little Rat Terrier likes it. The dog had developed a bad rash on his back, he scratched and scratched until the rash was red and he had lost a good deal of fur. My son told me that it was probably the cheap dog food, Alpo. Well, the rash is clearing up and the fur is growing back. More importantly my little dog isn't scratching all the time. IAMS costs a bit more but it is worth it. January 2, 2018 Up-Date. The dogs rash is completely healed and his fur is nearly filled in. No scratching at all.
customer_reviews.author: papatch

customer_reviews.title: My dog is dying
customer_reviews.text: My dog is dying after eating this product. I knew something was up when he threw up the first day. I thought it was nothing , but by day 3 he has been vomiting blood and his excrement is only blood. I really hope he makes it, and it is not because of any allergies in the food. This has never happen to him before, even dollar store pet food does not do this to him. I am now cooking for my dog and hand feeding him and I hope he recovers. Btw I cooked him some chicken and he ate it no problem... Please look up consumer reports on them, I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dog terrible gas
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a healthy 4 year old male rottweiler (Mojo) with a good appetite. I rarely change his diet, but his regular food was out of stock so I bought Iams Chicken & Lamb thinking it was the most similar to his regular food. When the Iams arrived, it looked and smelled very similar and my dog ate it just fine but it gave him a terrible upset stomach. He vomited a couple of times, had loose stools and horrible gas. The gas lasted for a few days. I managed to find his regular food, threw out the Iams and our Mojo is just fine now. I have never used Iams before and will not again.
customer_reviews.author: grant w bickham

customer_reviews.title: I have stored my dog food the same way for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have stored my dog food the same way for many many years. Plastic covered bin. Have always bought this brand. Ordered it from amazon this time and within a week and a half the food grew mold on it and had to be thrown away. Purchased another bag from local store and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Best value in quality dog food, for picky tummies!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Our pets never have gas, or problems with their poop consistency. This has been our choice for 12yrs running, after giving up Hills Science Diet. We've never regretted it, and appreciate the savings that Iams offers, without sacrificing quality. Even the picky tummies of my German Shepherd and Std Poodle agree! Will buy again! Amazon delivers all of our pet food, and I love the ease! If you found my review helpful, please indicate so, as I did not receive any compensation via $ or product for my time. Your feedback is enough, and I appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: TransplantMama, RN

customer_reviews.title: Not for Pointer Sister
customer_reviews.text: This food was not the right one for Pointer Sister. When I got her from the rescue, she'd been eating this for months, so I kept her on it to avoid upsetting her tummy. But I noticed that she was extremely itchy, had bald spots in her coat, and constantly acted hungry. I'm not sure all these issues were 100% due to the food, but I switched her to a grain-free, limited ingredient brand as soon as I felt I could. (I'll review that product separately.) On the new food, her coat is gorgeous, she rarely itches, and she seems full. Of course it costs 3x as much, but Pointer Sister is worth every penny! :)
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl89Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product, I have 4 furry babies, and they all just love Iams. I order this product often, saves me the convenience on lugging it around from the store, to the truck, from the truck into the house. I now have it delivered right to my door step, and now, only have to bring it inside :) I also have this as a dash button so I can just click on the button and a couple of days later again on my doorstep. Every package has arrived in tac, no tears in the bag, and always good doggy food.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Good product... Healthy pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good food I've used it for cats and dogs for years... Puts a nice healthy weight on them and a nice coat.. my cat lived for 18 years on this brand of dry food...with no illnesses... these tiny dog food chunks are perfect for an older dog with chewing problems... Also works very well for dogs with grain allergies... But you must gradually add the food so they will get used to it and most of the time once they start eating it they won't eat anything else You will not have to buy a grain free food
customer_reviews.author: Annchapman

customer_reviews.title: Changed deliverydate to September 21st
customer_reviews.text: Changed deliverydate to September 21st well before the deadline and it was delivered in August. the food is lasting longer than expected so I did make several changes. I now cannot figure out how to change the subscription because it shows me getting another one in September. The price is good and it is great to have it delivered, but this is not working. I have to find out how to change It or cancel it.
customer_reviews.author: j smith

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended good dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the top brands of dog food that my vet recommended. Although my dog is a big boy, he likes the mini-chunks best. The convenience of ordering from Amazon and having it delivered to my door is incredible. And even though it is about the same price as it is at the store, it sure beats lifting it into the shopping cart, lifting it out of the shopping cart to pay for it, lifting it back into the shopping cart to take it to the car, lifting it into the car, lifting it out of the car to carry into the house.
customer_reviews.author: kcdcpa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Family🐾🐾🐾
customer_reviews.text: My pit/lab is very picky as she is getting older. Refusing to finish the last 20 pounds of dog food!! I decided to order the 5 pound back and mix with the previous dog food I had been ordering for at least 6 months. Finally able to finish the last 30 pound bag mixed in with this and she LOVES LOVES this brand and the small chewy chunks. I tried the next size to make sure this is what she and my 4 yr old black lab likes and gulping this down! SO Tali & Carly are loving IAMS and I’m Loving 🥰 💜
customer_reviews.author: jrsygal59

customer_reviews.title: My Finnicky Dogs Love IAMS
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love this food, even the very finnicky one!! And it has good ingredients so I'm happy that the dogs love it! With Mr. hard to please, I do not have to add "stuff" to get him going! That is a definite plus. Good food and they love it, so it is a definite winner. The price is not too steep, so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love you...
customer_reviews.text: I have 11 rescue dogs and this is the only dog food they will eat. I’ve tried changing their dog food to the fancy stuff but they ended up losing interest and losing a lot of weight. So I went back to Iams. This is the best deal I can find for the money, delivery is crazy fast and I ordered every three weeks! Update: I’ve been reordering this every few weeks. Seller is perfect. Amazon no longer does next day deliveries, and this can mess me up since I’m on a controlled income. I know I’m the nut with 11 dogs, but I saved most from execution and all from abuse. Come on Amazon, help a Dog Mommy out!!
customer_reviews.author: Cloey M McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Makes my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating Iam’s mini chunks dog food for months that I had been purchasing from Walmart. I started feeding her from the bag I purchased here on Amazon On Monday evening and she has vomiting after each feeding ( a total of 3) since then. I just threw out this bag and on my way to Walmart to purchase a bag and some Pepto for my digs obvious upset tummy. My dog has never vomited. Do not purchase this food from Amazon. I hope it is only an upset tummy and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog throw up
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a dog from the shelter and thought to buy IAMS due to all the positive reviews. All a sudden, my dog started to have uncontrollable diarrhea that could only be controlled by probiotic supplements. Even then, it was on and off. Thank god I switched her food to Nutri Vita. Right after I transitioned, her bowel problems went away almost instantly. I no longer have to buy expensive probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs liked this product just fine but after two bags worth of feedings over time I had to switch because it just made them smell awful. Both breath and body had a distinct odor that couldn't be explained by another source. They have been off this food for a week and they already smell much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cola B

customer_reviews.title: I have always been pleased with iams
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that have been eating iams their whole lives. I was buying it in the retail pet stores, and one day they no longer were carrying it. I asked one of the employees why they were no longer carrying iams, and to my surprise she told me that they were only carrying natural and holistic foods. I have always been pleased with iams, despite the criticism. My dogs love it, and are healthy, and happy. I was very excited to see that amazon had the 30 pound bags, and on prime. It came quick, and neatly packaged. I will now only be ordering through amazon, you can't beat the convience.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food - My Dogs Love It and the Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: I have three Chihauhuas and they love this food and thrive on it. The quailty is good and I love the convenience of being able to buy this online and have it delivered to my front porch. I get the large bag and it's hard for me as a small woman to get it off the top shelf in the stores where it seems to always be located. Amazon's price is also cheaper. Definitely works for me. The only con and it s a small one is you have to open the bag with scissors. No pull tab.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable food
customer_reviews.text: I pair this with pedigree wet food and my two picky eaters (toy poodles) finish their whole bowls. Prior to this I was buying royal canin poodle food which was expensive and when I realized corn was the main ingredient I immediately looked for alternatives. My dogs prefer this over royal canin and based on the ingredients list Iams is better quality and has less filler than royal canin
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister's dog when she was out of food and having covid19 issues. It was very inexpensive and has a lot of food for less money than most brands which is great in a pinch which is exactly what I needed, but after reading the ingredients I would not recommend this for regular use. I can't imagine this being very good for your dog long term. It didn't upset his stomach and he ate it without issues though!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & healthful
customer_reviews.text: I like this dog food. I don’t buy into those outrageously expensive designer dog foods, but I do pay attention to ingredients. This food seems to be a good mix between affordability and healthy ingredients. I also like that it isn’t crazy high in fat and protein like some dog foods. My doggo and I are happy with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I have a Doberman and I’ve tried all kinds of foods to help him gain weight and keep his stomach settled. This is the only food that has worked for him. I have recently taken in an elderly German Shepherd and he also likes it. The German Shepherd quit eating the food that his owner sent him with and will only eat this food. It has been good for the puppy and the elderly dog. No stomach issues, no energy issues. All around good quality food that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Katja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, is firm and doesn’t smell bad. Unfortunately l asked to return the new bags due to animal protein allergy in my dog. Excellent customer service, they gave me a refund immediately and told me to keep the unopened bags. Will give them to my granddaughter for her dog, its a fresh good protected food. Thank you IAMs
customer_reviews.author: Maya Raiz

customer_reviews.title: They seem to like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs (small to very large) are picky, like most, but the one dry dog food that they always seem to be okay with (even by itself and unmixed with wet) is the Iams bag here, in the minichunks. It's not terrible for them, not absolutely outrageous in cost (though I still wish it were less), and they all will eat it...repeatedly...without getting bored. That's the key. They eat it!
customer_reviews.author: D.L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have always had the best reaction to IAMS mini-chunks. Our mini schnauzer lived 18 years and, for the most part, this is what he ate. Our Golden doodle loves the mini-chunks. We tried getting him to eat the larger size or a different brand, but mini-chunks is his favorite. He’s healthy and he has beautiful, full coat.
customer_reviews.author: Open mind and heart

customer_reviews.title: My dogs look great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Iams for years. Occasionally I will run short on their food and it might be a little cheaper to pick up a small bag of something else, but I always end up getting their Iams as soon as possible. They look so good and POOP so much less! Their body can absorb the nutrients more completely and so much less yard pick up to do!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels1

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Our three dogs love this food and their health and coats are excellent on this brand. We're very pleased with Iams! Previous brands we've tried ran the spectrum of super-elite and expensive, grain-free...you name it. Iams is the best we've tried and it's affordable. We have this on auto-ship.
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: No Expiration Date?
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 dogs seem to be happy eating this food. We have bought other high end food that they did not enjoy. Regular eating and stools. This last bag we bought did NOT have an expiration date. That scares me. IAMS claims dry food is good for 16 months. One bag did have a date and the other did not. Watch for expiration's just in case.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: ... mostly due to the ingredients which I felt were better than they were getting and they have started eating ...
customer_reviews.text: I started my dogs on ims young but went off of it for another brand and then had trouble with them eating so did eventually put them back on ims mostly due to the ingredients which I felt were better than they were getting and they have started eating again very well and are very active and healthy, the problem they have is me treating them like children and spoiling them with cookies lol (treats) too often. But yes I do recommend Ims. They are very active very yapping maltese chihuahua mix (so double yappers sigh) lol
customer_reviews.author: btack

customer_reviews.title: Super Healthy Choice And My Dog Loves This
customer_reviews.text: I have a vizsla who is 10 years old and he loves this stuff. And IAMS is a great safe dog food not like that Old Yeller poison or that stuff some careless and souless companies put out that KILL YOUR BEST FRIEND?!! Arrg!!! Anyway, yeah this is a great dog food and it's pretty reasonable especially if you set up to buy it with subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: virtuadept

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I assume the flavor is good because my dogs will eat it and they are actually quite picky. Tue bag camr packaged in a huge box and left on my porch. I had to havemy neighbor come move it because it was leaning up against the door and I could not get out and for the life of me I could not figure out why lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Iams premium dog food. Great value for a great dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Iams dog foods but they don’t make a gluten free variety so I had to find another brand. But if gluten isn’t a problem, this is a premium dog food that my dogs love and have beautiful coats and you feed a much smaller amount than lesser brands and my dogs are in perfect weight.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Decent food that dogs like. Amazon needs to get the pricing consistent though.
customer_reviews.text: I like this dog food. We have a Lab and an American bulldog and both eat it excitedly and don't have any digestive issues with it. I gave it only 3 stars because it's first ingredient is corn meal and because the price is so back and force. I order this routinely for $28 and some change. It seems like I have to check 2 or 3 different times before I see it at that price again. For example, I bought it for that price 10 days ago, now it's listed at $43. That's really frustrating .
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it.
customer_reviews.text: ?? This is the dog food that both my dog she is. Honestly I was just too lazy to go to the store and have to deal with all the masks wearing because of the coronavirus. So I'm so glad that you're the one had this. I got it very quickly. And my dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmermaid85

customer_reviews.title: Will try another dog food
customer_reviews.text: The package came in good shape but my dogs don't seem to like it much. I've been trying different foods to see which will make them eat more readily. I got the minichunks because one of my dogs is 14 yrs old and seems to like softer things and thought the smaller bits would be easier for her to eat even though they are dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a 20 pound dog that is all go when he is awake. This food satisfies him and provides all the zip he needs. Plus the nourishment also provides him with a great coat, good gums and teeth, and excellent sleeping habits. If you have a small dog this is the dog food he needs to be healthy and HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Judy K. Deatherage

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to switch
customer_reviews.text: My Chloe is a 4 year old mixed breed doggy with a pretty sensitive stomach. I originally had her on the Kibbles and Bits for years because that seemed to be the only dry food that would fill her up without cause irregular bowel movements. Unfortunately, over the years I guess her body changes and needed something different. This food cleared up her diarrhea issues and put her back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Same exact dog food I can get at a store but Amazon offers a competitive price! My dog has been eating this since he was 1 years old and he will be 3 in December. The bag is big and the price is great! I love the fact that it comes straight to my door, no heavy lifting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Schatzman

customer_reviews.title: We Like
customer_reviews.text: Two of our dogs have been on this food since we have had them. One for over five years and one for about three years. They love the taste. Sometimes it's hard to find in our stores as they are sold out. I like knowing we have an option to order here.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have thrived on this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my dogs this food for over 10 years. My dogs have been healthy and happy and have never gotten tired of the food. It’s really convenient and economical to have it deivered right to my front door. Added bonus - this food is readily available in most chain stores (at a slightly higher price) so if I ever run out, I can get some to get me by.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky poops
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened here but my dogs poops smelled absolutely horrible after using this brand.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Recomended By My Cousin Who Is A Vet
customer_reviews.text: Not only that, but also, I have had dogs almost all my life (83 years). The fancier, more expensive brands simply have been a disaster and I stopped trying them years ago. They not only frequently caused stomach upset but also resulted in allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: excellent disposition, good body weight
customer_reviews.text: Chewbarka is a Labrabull rescue. He's been my loyal friend and confidant for about 4 years now. IAMS has been our choice since he was a pup. Today, "Bark" is incredibly healthy with perfectly white teeth, gorgeous shiny coat, excellent disposition, good body weight, and mischievous spirit. He's built like a champion and has the stamina and intelligence of a trained athlete. All of this I attribute to his IAMS. PLUS... he likes it... IAMS is the real deal. Good stuff... Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Chewbarka's Human Mom

customer_reviews.title: I have a 50lbs pit bull and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients - can’t complain. Nothing in the ingredients list scare me. Flavor - My dog loves it straight out of the bag. No trickery need to get my dog to ear this. I also use it as lower value training treats. One piece is good for sits, walks, and minor tricks. When she is distracted then I will need a few more kibbles to get her attention. Value - Value come from the fact this food is highly available everywhere. So if I run out, I just go to the local pharmacy to get a small bag while I wait for the big bag to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Iams made her feel better!
customer_reviews.text: Switched my dog to Iams after being on Rachel Ray nutrish for the past 6 mos. During the six mos, my pup got sick and kept on throwing up. Since switching to Iams, she’s feeling better, coat is shiny and she gobbles it all up.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my Pomerrain this brand since I've had him. This recent purchase made him sick and vomit about an hour after eating. Every time he ate he got sick, I made a vet appointment and changed his diet and he stopped getting sick. Nothing but changing his diet made him better. I feel like this must be a bad batch of Iams Mini Chunks. I did some research and Iams Dog food had the worst Reviews and Complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amelinda colon

customer_reviews.title: Was Unimpressed with Value
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this bag of dog food because I was having a hard time finding it at the stores. At my local grocery I would have payed $11. For a 30lb bag. Instead I receive a small 7lb bag for $10. Not a good value but I guess something is better than nothing. Next time I will just keep searching the empty shelves for the dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Levan

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food out one dog would eat. We bought another leading brand and stopped after ti days after noticing she didn’t want anything to do with it plus all the pieces of food had different food coloring in them, if I remember right something between 4 & 6 different colors and that is bad for dogs in there food after a while and can cause health problems down the line. We will never ever away from this brand dry dog food ever again. As long as it stays the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good premium food.
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull is very picky. I went through cheap and non grain expensive brands. He eats this every time and has gotten more muscle bc he's eating good and tons of energy. Shiny coat. Big difference. If he likes it I like it.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM

customer_reviews.title: Feed this to your furry children!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had many long lived, healthy happy dogs on this food. First ingredient is meat. Better concentration percentages of key ingredients than more expensive foods. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: L&D

customer_reviews.title: Premium food, bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than I can find it at any store. Iams is the probably the most affordable of all the premium dog foods. Many, many dogs over the years and this food definitely keeps them around longer. Much easier to maintain a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Haller

customer_reviews.title: Good price and Great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is the winning dog food at our house. Fine quality. The minichunks make it easy for my smaller dog (23 lbs mix breed) to eat. She likes it with a touch of wet food (helps with digestion and hydration). But I would recommend this product and this seller. Good price and good, known product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren F. Munroe

customer_reviews.title: They all love this. One of our dogs refuses to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, ranging in size from 45lbs to 90lbs. They all love this. One of our dogs refuses to eat anything that is larger in size so the mini chunks are the perfect size. We usually add some coconut oil for coat healthiness but even without they really like Iams.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for front door delivery.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his food and they were out at the grocery store. I tried to give him some Pedegree and he had the worst gas. Thankfully I could order this online and he is one happy dog and I have one happy nose.
customer_reviews.author: Lapis Blue

customer_reviews.title: My Vet approved Iams
customer_reviews.text: My pug eats 1/2 cup for breakfast and 1/2 cup for dinner. She has been on Iams since she was 7 months. She's 5 now. Her weight is perfect. Teeth look great and Vet is very happy with her overall.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Long

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon Delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. However, I love my Amazon delivery person for bringing this awkward & heavy af box to my door twice a month. Due to a disability I can’t lift anything over 10lbs. and they our my personal savior.
customer_reviews.author: Jmeow

customer_reviews.title: Dog preferred!
customer_reviews.text: I love blue buffalo, but my dogs aren't a fan. They seem to always opt for Iams. When given the option of eating blue buffalo or iams, they always run for the iams and leave the expensive BB out untouched. Might not have as many benefits as BB, but I can tell you that my dogs prefer it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy N.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs had major digestive issues after eating this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Saucy Moxie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, there is nothing I dislike about Iams. We took them off of Nutro and switched to this and they seem to like it better. Both dogs have allergies and the itching has seemed to slow down as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: iams
customer_reviews.text: our dogs really like iams. we have had several dog foods and they prefer iams lol. so we stay with the iams we have the chow hounds that holds 50pounds of food and mix the dog foods and they alway dig out the iams. so now we just buy several different flavores of iams and mix in the bin and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy items inside please
customer_reviews.text: The item is very heavy at 30 lb and was left by the outer door. I prefer that deliveries are made by the house door. Most the times they are, but this heavy I wouldn’t like to carry myself. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carol Alaimo

customer_reviews.title: Price constantly going up.
customer_reviews.text: I use this dog food and it is great. However the price has been going up consistently to where it is no longer a good deal price wise to purchase on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: We order the 30lb bag bc it seems to be cheaper than buying around here in store. We’ve given this to our 2 dogs for years & have had no issues. We actually tried other kinds before & found out that our older dog is super sensitive to other kinds. It seems like this is the only kind that he doesn’t have a reaction to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Better than going to the store
customer_reviews.text: I really love the fact that UPS delivered this instead of my regular mail lady since she is an elderly woman and did not want her to lug up to 50 pounds to my porch. As for the product I have searched a lot and found this to be the best cheap dog food that has meat as the number one ingredient. So far it seems like my dogs like it
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: My Best choice for 33 years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Iams minichunks for over 30 years for 5 dogs. It was recommended by owners and handlers at dog shows for promoting good health, longevity, energy, shiny coat, and in those situations regularity before showtime. I have never considered changing food and my now 12 year old still asks for it and eats it with vigor. The dogs are lively, happy, playful and friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfixit

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because our dogs seemed like they were bored with our old dog food. We have noticed with some brands it makes one of our dogs shed more. Both dogs seemed to love this dog food and we haven't noticed an increase in shedding.
customer_reviews.author: marc mullins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for our Boxer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for our Boxer. We we're buying the more expensive Blue Buffalo and he wasn't retaining the nutrition or processing the contents as well and had diarreah. We switched to this and he was much healthier looking (glossy coat, no ribs showing, and no more diarreah). Yay! Thank you Iams :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSlime

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I now see reviews where this food causes vomiting and diarrhea in animals. Just spent $500 on tests at the vet with no conclusive diagnosis. After giving chicken and rice he got okay. Went back to this dog food and he was ill again. No more Iams.
customer_reviews.author: jsknc

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: As always, Iams dog food is great! High quality and fresh, good for your doggie friends. Good nutrition and a nice big bag so you won't run out too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wear a mask!

customer_reviews.title: Dogs thought 👎
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wouldn't eat it. It seemed fine to me. Packaged well, food was fresh, I believe. No, I didn't eat it, just observation. I would order again if they'd eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Two2lu

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had was with this last order. The bag was sitting on my trash can. No box in site. The boxes in the past were pretty roughed up, but intact.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Denison

customer_reviews.title: My small dog can eat it more easily than bigger chunk dry food
customer_reviews.text: I changed to this for an older dog that needed smaller pellets of food. It was better for him, and now my remaining small dog seems to like it fine.
customer_reviews.author: popinjey

customer_reviews.title: a brand that I trust
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding Iams products for a long time. My fur babies are happy and healthy. I have thought about trying other food but why change when my boys look so good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vengrouskie

customer_reviews.title: Goldens choose IAMS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my Golden retrievers for years on IAMS~!!! I will do so for the decade...or more. :) They are healthy, happy and active. THEY LOVE IAMS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eaters Beware
customer_reviews.text: This food looks like a quality product, and I loved reading the positive reviews. I adopted a blue heeler from a local shelter, and unfortunately she is a picky eater and refuses to touch this stuff. She immediately tries to flip her bowl over and hide it. She won't eat it later on either, I thought she might go back to it, but she doesn't. I do think it's a great product, but my picky eater is not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: It's what my vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: Taste? I, myself, have not tried it. Dog seems to like it (We call her "Mikey") 🤣. Value? Less expensive than what I was feeding, and the bag is the same size, so...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs never liked any of the 15 of so grain free food i bought them.....then were not a fan of the rachel ray variations......they eat this stuff right up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit bundling fragile items with dog food
customer_reviews.text: Two orders ago a video game was bundled with the dog food. The presentation box was flattened, but the disc inside worked. This order my Multi Tool was bundled with the dog food and again the box was smashed, but the tool does not appear damaged. But using the box for permanent storage is now out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Our dog got sick, so threw it away, got different food, and she got better (of course, can't say for certain it was this food)
customer_reviews.text: It may or may not have been related to this food...but just after starting to eat this food, our dog got sick, so we threw it away and replaced it, and she got better. Can't say for certain that the food was the cause of her sickness, but that is the only thing we are aware of that was different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well for my dog his concern Fresh Food
customer_reviews.text: Why the bags are coming already popped stale food before you even get it.Its your packing plant (Amazon) They put the food in a bigger box like they used to anyway I opend the box and sure enough it was popped they Didn't put any of those air cousins in it
customer_reviews.author: AmaRAzon Customer RANDY

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Considering the pandemic it’s a great price. My best friends Airedale Terrier loves it! It even has a picture of an Airedale on the package! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawanda McNeil

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small chi-pin about 19 lbs. She loves Iams and it keeps her energetic and her coat smooth and shiny. Teeth are great. Will always feed Iams.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My pet likes this.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this brand, he has remained healthy and has been fed this for three years. He has plenty (oh, YES) of vitality and has a lovely coat. I think that as long as it is appropriate I will feed him this and then cl 'll
customer_reviews.author: Kymara

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats it and poops good. I asked him whats his take on it and he said "woof woof woof woof woof grrrrr....woof" So it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand! Been using it for YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Been using Iams for years. All of our dogs are very heated and have never had any adverse reactions with this food. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vwink

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this dog food was a good value based on the ingredients listed on the label. Both my dogs seemed to love it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly bechdel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t not buy again to be safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my beagle, trying to save a dollar and he wouldn’t really eat it. The scent and shape was the same as in store, but he wasn’t a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Beluch

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this brand
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food I have a small dog and she has a hard time with other dog foods because it is so big and hard for her to chew the Iams dog is great for her she eats it better as well
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: I have picky dogs and they love these. Have tried other brands and flavors but this seems to be the one that they love the most.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It was left for the wild animals
customer_reviews.text: Your picture shows that it was left outside my fence. The sign on my gate tells you to ring the bell and then I will bring in the dogs and open the gate for you. I was here. No phone call. It is now dark and I cannot go out with my walker. If there is anything left of the dog food in the morning, I will carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: midlands maid

customer_reviews.title: Elder Dog With Diabetes
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a healthier Kibble for an elder dog with Diabetes and he loves it. They have always eaten Iams food so finding this was a blessing. No more sensitive stomach and he looks healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Music3343

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: My babies love it, and my friends baby loves it as well. Which is very funny because she usually has to put chicken, broth on her food in order for her to eat. But when she brings her to my house, she eats from their bowls with no problem. In fact she eats more than she would normally eat at home.
customer_reviews.author: LaShanda Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good price, our dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Your mileage may vary, but our dog really likes this stuff. It's also very reasonably priced and consistently good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B4E1

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the food and dance everything the see it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited that Amazon has this an an option to purchase. I drive a Jeep and it was always hard to pack everything in it since I basically don't have a trunk. My dogs love the food and dance everything the see it on the porch. They deliver it in a box which is super smart since I was worried that the bag might tear. Again this is one of the best buys I have done on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it and I love what’s good for me dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. I was having issue with vomiting and skin allergies. Switched to imes and both problems cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: DoggieMom

customer_reviews.title: All fuzzy butt will eat
customer_reviews.text: I started my fur baby when he was 8 months old. Its the only dog food he will eat. He is now 12 years old
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wood

customer_reviews.title: so I happily obliged! She also only has 3 teeth
customer_reviews.text: I know Iams is not the most high-quality dog food out there, but when my elderly dog was going through a picky stage this was all she was willing to eat, so I happily obliged! She also only has 3 teeth, and she gobbled this down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: 3 happy girls 🐶
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs really love this food. I will be ordering every month from now on. Great value buy in my book. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Thai

product_meta.title: IAMS PROACTIVE HEALTH Minichunks Dry Dog Food, Chicken
product_meta.description: Size:30 lb.IAMS ProActive Health Minichunks Dog Food is veterinarian recommended and made with real ingredients. Our recipe starts with farm raised chicken and includes wholesome grains and veggies. Plus, our quality, easily digestible ingredients provide your dog with a strong immune system; healthy skin, coat, and metabolism; and strong bones. The crunchy kibbles scrub your dog’s teeth with every bite, reducing plaque and bad breath. Look for the IAMS difference.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 30 lb. bag of IAMS Proactive health Adult Minichunks Dry Dog Food Chicken
1st ingredient is real, farm-raised chicken, and features smaller kibble size
Promotes healthy digestion with a tailored blend of wholesome fibers and prebiotics
Builds strong muscles with quality protein sourced from real chicken
Supports a strong immune system with antioxidants

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
